Hi Everyone Good morning.

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: You need to update golang to 1.18, see https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/pull/24926

author: tersec
content:
That PR says:
> Pls don't bump to 1.18 though, we want to prolong compatibility with the last supported Go version (1.17 currently).
?

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: We don't want to bump the default in our code to 1.18, you can bump it locally if you want to
